verses.roman:
prabhura premāveśa dekhi' brāhmaṇa--vismita
prabhura rakṣā lāgi' vipra ha-ilā cintita

synonyms: prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prema-āveśa—ecstatic love; dekhi'-seeing; brāhmaṇa—the brāhmaṇa; vismita—astonished; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; rakṣā lāgi'-for the protection; vipra—the brāhmaṇa; ha-ilā—became; cintita—very anxious.
translation: The brāhmaṇa was astounded to see the symptoms of ecstatic love exhibited by Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. He then became anxious to give the Lord protection.
